Properties

Use the Properties dialog box to view information for a project database, project, Version Manager 5.3/6.0 folder, versioned file, or revision. Depending on the object you select, the following appears:
  • Project Database or Project: project configuration file and archive information, workspace settings, and granted privileges
  • Version Manager 5.3/6.0 Folder: general and workspace information
  • Versioned File: archive creation information, workspace settings, and granted privileges
  • Revision: revision creation information, version labels, promotion groups

See Also
